title: Easy (Duet)
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lionel Richie]
I know it sounds funny but I just can't stand the pain
Girl, I'm leaving you tomorrow
Seems to me girl, you know I've done all I can
See I begged, stole and I borrowed, yeah
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
So I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning, yeah
That's why I'm easy, so easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
[Verse 2: Willie Nelson]
Why in the world would anybody put chains on me?
I've paid my dues to make it
Everybody wants me to be what they want me to be
I'm not happy when I try to fake it
[Chorus]
That's why I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
That's why I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
[Bridge]
I want to be high, so high
I want to be free to know the things I do are right
I want to be free, just me, oh, baby

[Chorus]
Ooh, that's why I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
That's why I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
'Cause I'm easy
Easy like Sunday morning, Yeah
'Cause I'm easy
I'm easy like Sunday morning
